meta.author: mosaddiq

hero.name: mosaddiq
hero.title: Frontend Developer &
hero.subtitle: Psychology-Focused Designer
hero.description: I craft digital experiences that reduce cognitive load and improve user workflows. With 2 years of focused development, I build web applications where psychology meets modern technology.

story.paragraph: Two years ago, I made a pivotal decision: "Instead of consuming digital content, why not create meaningful experiences for others?" This shift in mindset launched my journey into frontend development with a unique focus on user psychology.

I began by studying cognitive load theory and user behavior patterns, then learned to implement these insights through modern web technologies. My approach combines technical proficiency with psychological principles—creating interfaces that feel intuitive rather than overwhelming.

Today, I specialize in psychology-informed web development—building applications where every interaction is designed to reduce mental effort and enhance user satisfaction. My work focuses on the intersection of human cognition and digital interfaces.

projects.readme: Project display logic: If 'preview_image' field exists, show the image with filter effects. If 'preview_image' is missing or empty, show the 'highlights' list instead. This allows flexible content display based on available assets.

items.title: ScrollMuse
items.subtitle: Infinite Wisdom PWA
items.description: A mindful content consumption platform designed to reduce information overload. Built with React 19 and TypeScript, featuring intelligent content delivery algorithms and progressive web app capabilities for seamless offline access.
highlights: Intelligent content delivery system preventing cognitive overload
Performance-optimized infinite scroll maintaining 60fps on all devices
Progressive Web App architecture enabling offline content access
Minimalist visual design reducing distractions and mental fatigue
Strategic typography and spacing based on reading comprehension research
items.impact: Transforms overwhelming content consumption into a mindful, sustainable experience through evidence-based UX design

items.title: typ1ng
items.subtitle: Smart Adaptive Typing Test
items.description: An adaptive typing assessment platform that analyzes user performance patterns to optimize skill development. Features machine learning-inspired algorithms, real-time analytics, and immersive audio feedback through Web Audio API implementation.
highlights: Dynamic difficulty adjustment based on real-time performance analysis
Comprehensive analytics dashboard tracking multiple performance metrics
Custom audio engine providing contextual feedback for enhanced learning
Extensive vocabulary database with intelligent content filtering
Distraction-free interface designed for sustained focus and flow state
items.impact: Revolutionizes typing skill development by replacing static tests with personalized, adaptive learning experiences

items.title: ClipZinc
items.subtitle: Lightning-Fast Clipboard Manager
items.description: A productivity-focused Chrome extension that extends system clipboard capabilities with intelligent history management and power-user features. Built with modern Manifest V3 architecture, prioritizing user privacy through local-only data storage.
highlights: Unlimited clipboard history transcending operating system limitations
Comprehensive keyboard shortcut system for workflow acceleration
Intelligent notification system with contextual feedback
Modern browser extension architecture ensuring future compatibility
Privacy-first design with zero data transmission or cloud dependency
items.impact: Eliminates productivity bottlenecks by seamlessly extending native system capabilities while maintaining complete user privacy
